author: ShehzadUIT
body:
I am looking for a PowerShell script that stops syncing OneDrive folders.
I.e. I want to trigger the Stop Sync encircled using PS:

comments.body: @ShehzadUIT The repo is for development only. For support please use forums or/and stackoverflow.com

title: Use PowerShell to stop Syncing OneDrive folders
